channel.title: soylent on BRYSGO

item.title: Soylent mission one
item.description: UPDATE: I got a later version of soylent and used a different recipe and it was yummy. This is the first thing I’m going to try when I get my soylent… leecaubleblog: Baked Soylent This is not my first attempt to bake with Soylent. During beta testing I made a few batches of peanut butter cookies. I made a few mistakes with this batch of brownies but overall the taste and texture are OK.
